page.title: 08BROWNIES
page.content: AT BROWNIES by KAREN KENINGALE. EVERY WEDNESDAY NIGHT FROM 6.00 TO 7.30 I GO TO BROWNIES.AT 5.00 I HAVE MY TEA,GET WASHED AND GET MY UNIFORM ON.THEN I GO IN TO THE LOUNGE.THEN I SIT AND WATCH TELEVISION.LATER ON CHARLOTTE HOBSON COMES TO MY HOUSE BECAUSE SHE GOES TO BROWNIES TOO.AT 5.45 WE WAIT FOR THE CAR TO COME.WHEN IT COMES WE GET IN THE CAR AND GO TO BROWNIES.AT BROWNIES WE ARE ALWAYS EARLY SO WE PLAY TIGI FROM TABLE TO TABLE.WHEN BROWN OWL COMES COMES WE GET INTO OUR SIXES.THEN BROWN OWL CALLES US UP IN OUR SIXES.ARE SIXES ARE KELPIES,PIXIES,ELVES AND IMPS.THE REGISTER IS CALLED AND WE PAY OUR SUBS .ARE SUBS ARE 20p.THEN WE DO THINGS LIKE GARDEN OR MAKE THINGS.AT 7.15 WE PLAY A GAME.THEN WE SING BROWNIE BELLS AND SAY OUR PROMISE.THEN AFTER WE HAVE SAID OUR PROMISE WE GO HOME.
